name: NOAA'sArk
0:
”Alexa, ask Noah's Ark what is the height of the Ohio RIver at Cincinnati”
”Alexa, ask Noah's Ark river stage of Mississippi River at Baton Rouge”
”Alexa, ask Noah's Ark water level of Mississippi River at Saint Paul Minnesota”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: noah's ark
des: The US National Oceanic and Atmospheric Adminstration (NOAA) has an awesome hydrologic information page to help you plan boating and other activities on US rivers. If you just want to know the latest river level, the NOAA's Ark skill will look it up for you and answer by voice so that you know what conditions to expect. This skill is not developed by or affiliated with NOAA or the National Weather Service, but is a big fan!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
